    Loads index.db and converts all maps inside it to destination path specified by MAP_SERV_DEST_PATH.

void Convert::getMapPaths (  uint32  mapSet,
MC2String &  destPath,
MC2String &  srcPath
)  [static]
 

Sets destPath to MAP_SERV_DEST_PATH and using mapSet to determine which MAP_SERV_SOURCE_PATH_<mapSet> that srcPath would be assign to.

Parameters:
mapSet the map set, so the corrent MAP_*_<num> gets selected
destPath holds destination path. MAP_SERV_DEST_PATH
srcPath holds source path. MAP_SOURCE_PATH_<mapSet>
